about_the_game:
"Church Simulator" is a first-person simulation game that encompasses all the duties of a church priest, offering both a spiritual and entertaining experience.

Baptize the babies brought to the church by immersing them in holy water. Be careful to perform the baptism correctly, or you might drown the babies!

Customize your church’s appearance to make it stylish and engaging. Create the most suitable church design to attract more people.

Purchase furniture, paintings, statues, and seats from the store to decorate your church’s interior design.

Stock your church’s shelves with products and arrange them to collect donations. Manage the church’s economy by selling items like Bibles, candles, and souvenirs.

Bless the people coming to the church with your cross to guide them to faith. Show that you are a true clergyman.

Detect and ward off evil spirits around the church and graveyard using a detector. Don’t let the evil spirits curse your church.

In "Church Simulator," try to manage your church in the best way possible by making the right decisions. You’ll need to handle the church’s economy by collecting donations from people. Also, organize group events like weddings, funerals, and ceremonies. Bring more people to your church and expand it! Additionally, feed stray animals, solve the village’s problems, visit local merchants, give sermons, and simulate the life of a real pastor. Will you be able to manage your church in "Church Simulator," a game that offers both a spiritual and peaceful yet humorous and entertaining experience?

  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X

short_description: Manage your own church. Perform baptisms, hear confessions, collect donations, oversee weddings and funerals, sell souvenirs, and customize your church. Manage the church’s economy and work to expand your church.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
